titleInfo.title: Crazy Elmer and Linda Lee at the Mannos Theaters

mods.abstract: One color window card (split fountain, red to black, on white) announcing Crazy Elmer with Linda Lee and the Country Ramblers at the Mannos theater on August 21. Poster features a metal photoplate of Crazy Elmer.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
